        ToDoSortedList addTask(Task task)
        Parameters:
        task - a new task object
        Returns:
        the updated ToDoSortedList null if the task is already inside the list of tasks

      • addRecurringTask

        ToDoSortedList addRecurringTask(Task task,
                                long period,
                                int recurrenceNum)
        Parameters:
        task - a single task object which is the first task to be repeated. The task must have a specific start and/or end time.
        period - the interval between each two recurrence tasks
        recurrenceNum - the number of recurrence tasks, should be at least 2
        Returns:
        the updated toDoSortedList

      • searchByDate

        Search tasks on a particular date, the format of the string should be yyyyMMdd
        Parameters:
        searchDate - the date to be searched
        Returns:
        ArrayList of tasks on the specified date
